mathiwaranayaka di awasan nila prathipalaya nikuthkarana nisi baladhariya mathiwarana komasaristhuma wunata mathiwaranayak kiyanne rajyaya niladharin, deshapalana paksha niyojithayin, swadhina nirikshakayin, madhyewdin athulu wishala pirisak sakriyawa sahabhagiwana kriyawaliyak.paya kipayakata mathiwarana komasaristhumawa hangagena idala nathnam ohuwa biyawaddala samastha mathiwaranaye awasan prathipalaya pamanak wenaskarala kiyaganna puluwan kiyala sithima athishayinma bolada sithiwillak.chandaya prakasha kirima, chanda petti ganankarana madhyasthana wetha gena eema, chanda ganan kirima, prathipala nithukkirima me siyalla siduwenne siyalu paksha wala niyojithayan, swadhina nirikshakayan idiripita.ee niyojithayan sakshikaruwan karaganimin.ee ekama thanakadi da nowe diwayina pura ek ek disthrikka 22ka adala madhyasthana waladi.chanda petti sil thabimedi/sil kadimedi siyalu niyojithayanta thamange salakunu thabanna awasthawa laba denawa.wishala winiwida bhawayakin kerena mema kriyawaliye di oonama awasthawaka oonama nirikshakayekuta sakayak ath nam ee awasthawedima wirodhaya pala karanna puluwan.(udaharanayak lesa chandaya ganina wita kathiraya wenuwata irak gasa thibunoth, salakunu dekak athara kathiraya thibunoth ganina niladhariya ee chandaya katada kiya ho prathikshepitha chandayak bawata thiranaya karanne siyalu paksha niyojithayange ekagathawayen) mewani kriyawaliyakata pasu labena chanda madhyasthana, mathiwarana kottasha, disthrik mattame prathipala wala samprayukthaya thamayi awasana prathipalaya.
